data.text: Siɛgi zu Izilayɛle nuɓusɛiti ti ɠulani la Ezipete yooi ʋa,
Zuda yooi ɠɛni ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI zeizu ɲadegai,
Gizeiti ti ɠɛni ʋilisu ga baala sinɛ wolaiti kɛʋele,
Toɠa ɠale, kpoloɗɛi, è ʋelani ɠana?
Wa ma, gizeiti, toɠa ɠale wo ʋilini eɠɛ baala sinɛ wolaiti?
nii a ɗa fasai valibo, é kɛ ga kpoigi,
